alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:52PM MST until September 02 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 352 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Horseshoe Reservoir to near Rio Verde to Goldfield Ranch, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sugarloaf Mountain, Saguaro Lake, Goldfield Ranch, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, Rio Verde, Horseshoe Reservoir and Fort McDowell. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 193 and 208. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
